comment._content: Something is definitely screwy here - a Google map search for "Hipisau, Germany" turns up blank, and my ancient National Geographic Atlas has nothing, either. Maybe "Passau?"

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/13935339@N05] Wish I had more info...the envelope this was in only has "Hipisau Germany" written on it, and the back of the photos are blank

comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: The vertical fin & rudder sitting upright in the center of the photo look like the aft fuselage/empennage of a C-47... that's about all I can recognize out of it.
